## Matrix4x4.decompose() method

Decompose this matrix into its rotation, translation and scale components.

**Signature:**

```typescript
decompose(scale?: Vector3, rotation?: Quaternion | Matrix3x3 | Matrix4x4, translation?: Vector3): this;
```
